Address- 505 NE 82nd Street

Live in the new hip area of the Upper East Side - Little River Arts District.

Beautifully renovated apt. with new kitchen &  appliances, freshly painted, laundry and parking included.

Enjoy the trendy upper east side location with shops, eateries and public transit just steps away. Minutes to I-95, 10 minutes to the beach, 15 minutes to downtown and near the design district. Also, near FIU, Johnson & Wales and Barry University

titles: Hobby Farm on 5 Acres: 3 bdrm/1 bath/Avail
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


Summary:
The best views of Pikes Peak in the area! This home has no neighbors in the back area (150 acres or open acreage).

If you are NOT wanting to be cramped next to noisy neighbors, wake-up to view and beautiful sunrises, raise a few chickens/goats/turkeys/pigs/alpacas, a view of the Pikes Peak mountains and live out east, near Falcon Elementary, Peyton airport, but 1-2 miles close to everything – then this may be the hobby farm you are seeking! Our home is located in Peyton, CO. 80831 known as the "Lucky Acres" community. The home is has easy access to Safeway, Sonic, many restaurants and Walmart. We will be happy to send you more information or schedule a showing or virtual showing (COVID compliance).

The house has 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, brick-flooring sunroom, farmhouse kitchen, and living room--Modern farmhouse themed along with rustic window curtain plumbing piping décor! What's New: Septic is pump, Septic, 20 gal well Bladder, roof, water heater, furnace (propane), carpet, and freshly painted modern home updates.


Details:
5 Acre home with front yard white fencing , ~80 x 40 red Barn 4 stall w/corral and separate livestock area within the corral, playground, livestock-style out-building for other animals (fenced), and 10 x 16 storage Shed!

The property has a white 20ft hand-made picnic table
The property has 3 acres of barbed wire fenced bare land behind the house (awesome views)
The property has a 50' by 50' fenced pumpkin patch (over the septic area)
The property has a 1/4 acre ready to go garden with some garden boxes.
The property has a large compost pile at the end of the acreage
The property has a chicken/duck/turkey corral area attached to the barn
The property has a separate animal run attached to the barn
The property has a separate fenced/shed animal small pasture area with livestock shelter
Push mower available
No HOA/smoking/420/multi-families/camping/shooting
No water bill; the house is on a well.
D49 school district (or Peyton school district)
MVEA utilities provider
Apollo propane provider

titles: Nicely updated home located on a large corner lot and within walking~
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


Nicely updated home located on a large corner lot and within walking distance to the elementary school! You will fall in love with this home the minute you drive up. Great curb appeal with lush tropical landscaping welcomes you home. Step inside the spacious Foyer/Entry with custom built in storage area and ''drop'' space. This room has a feature wall with ''wood planks'' giving it a modern country feel. The adjacent Living Room also has a beautiful built in shelf and entertainment center for your flat screen TV. Gorgeous laminate flooring is found in all the main living areas & bedrooms, with tile in the Kitchen, Dining Room & both baths! The Kitchen is light & bright & has been updated with white cabinets, glass tile back splash & a full appliance package! When you want to relax, make you way to the Owner's Suite with it's own private bath. The bathroom features an updated vanity with new countertop, faucet, mirror and a large walk-in shower with custom tile and a frame-less glass door. Two additional bedrooms share an updated guest bath with new fixtures, countertop and a tiled tub surround that goes all the way to the ceiling! The Laundry Room gives you lots of storage space & the washer & dryer are included. Enjoy your morning coffee sitting on the screened porch that is newly renovated. A French door off the Dining Room & Kitchen gives you easy access to this great indoor/outdoor living space! A side door from the screened porch leads down a paver walkway to a large wood deck that is perfect for grilling & entertaining. The yard is fenced in and a double entry gate allows you to fit your RV or boat with ease and there is room for parking 5 cars! This home has it all. Some updates include: Bathrooms & Kitchen updated/remodeled, new tile floors in the Kitchen, Bathroom, & Dining Room areas and Laminate throughout the living areas & Bedrooms, custom built-ins in the entryway & for TV shelving, new interior paint, exterior paint 2015, new Metal Roof 2018, fenced in yard with St. Augustine grass, storage shed, newly renovated patio screen room, lush tropical foliage for privacy, and more! Located only 5 minutes to the river & 10 minutes to the beach! The best part is NO HOA FEE! 
Make your appt. to see this home today, before it's too late! Email for more details or to set up a viewing: ashleb8950gmailcom

descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


Magazine Perfect Top Designer House!!! A dream come true home. White clean line curb appeal w/ luxe details curated throughout. Meticulous landscaping surrounds the entire outdoor area, pool deck, outdoor barbecue/kitchen entertainment area. Wide open floor plan exudes light and sophistication. 4 Bedrooms all with en-suite baths with rain showers offer privacy with a split plan. About the neighborhood, Morningside, Miami's first historic neighborhood, is a gated community of approximately 500 homes just blocks away from the Biscayne Bay. titles: Woodspring Suites offers weekly rates starting at $667.
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


NO HASSLE - NO CREDIT CHECKS

Before you decide to stay at Woodspring Suites, we want you to be prepared--prepared for a better experience.  What that means to us is a truly affordable, incredibly clean, safer, simple, flexible experience.  And this is more than just a nice idea --it's the Woodspring Suites promise.  So how do we do it?  By combining all the convenience of a hotel with all the essentials of an apartment.  We are a hybrid--and that makes us better than a hotel, an apartment or any other short-term housing accommodations you’ll find.  Think about it—no extras padded into our price, no hidden fees.   No lease to sign, no utilities to set up.  That’s just for starters.  Find out below more of what to expect when you’re here.
•	Clean & Safe –Secure building access with electronically protected interior.  A Safety attendant is available after hotel hours.  All rooms are deep-cleaned after each check-out, and then go through a vigorous multi-point inspection.
•	Kitchen— Kitchens have a full-size refrigerator/freezer, ceramic stove-top, microwave, cabinet space and a spacious sink.
•	Furnished Studios—Dresser, nightstand, eating table with chair, clothes rack and extra storage space.
•	Satellite/Cable – Premium satellite or cable television with Movie Channels
•	24-Hour Laundry Facility—On-site laundry facility with keyed guest access only for your safety.
•	Linen Exchange— During office hours bring your towels/linens to the front desk for a quick exchange.
•	High-Speed Internet—Go online 24/7 with free wi-fi.  High speed internet available for a nominal fee.
•	Coffeemaker—A drip coffeemaker that makes 8 to 10 cups.  Yours to keep with a one-time fee.
•	Housekeeping –Housekeeping is included every other week.  Additional cleaning can be purchased for a fee.
•	Dish Pack—Service for two including plates, bowls, mugs, glasses, utensils, cooking slotted turner, skillet, saucepan, dish cloth and kitchen towel.  Yours to keep for a one-time charge.
•	Pets – Dogs are welcome (No Cats).  $50 fee required at check-in plus $10 per night.  Service animals always allowed at no cost.

 WOODSPRING SUITES DORAL
7500 NW 41st ST, MIAMI, FL 33166

YOUR HOME IS WAITING. Doral West Apartments is a premier living destination that offers 1, 2 and 3 bedroom garden or townhome-style apartments in Doral, Florida. Located within minutes of the area's most progressive employers and just sixteen miles west of downtown Miami- Doral West is convenient to shopping, dining and popular entertainment. Plus, we are nestled in the A-rated Doral school district and we are located less than a mile from the Florida Turnpike and less than 11 miles from Miami International Airport.Bask in the Florida sun at one of our two resort-style swimming pools and spa, or enjoy a stroll along our 13-acre lake. Stay active in our new fitness center or on the private tennis court. Just relax or get some work done in our all new resident lounge with cyber café. Plus, our pet park will give your furry friend ample green space to play. At Doral West Apartments, you can choose from spacious garden or townhome-style apartments that offer the ideal setting to entertain friends and family. With indulgent details like views of our 13-acre lake, spacious master suites and walk-in closets, you'll feel like royalty. titles: SW 102nd Ct, Perfect 4 BR 3 BA For Rent. Don't Miss This!
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post



Come view this beautiful home situated on a corner lot on a quiet, cul-de-sac street!The home offers a split floorplan with an open, central kitchen and living space featuring warm Mexican tile.  The roomy master bedroom has two walk-in closets with custom built-in storage and a large bathroom with Jacuzzi tub and separate shower.  The bright living space has a vaulted ceiling with plenty of natural light and french doors that open to a portico by the large pool.The yard is fully fenced in with tall hedges providing plenty of privacy and the large gate on the side allows access to park a boat or RV. On the back of the property is a serene outdoor shower for when you want to enjoy the beautiful South Florida weather! The updated kitchen provides plenty of space for cooking big meals with family and friends without bumping into one another and even has a large drink and coffee bar, along with a wine cooler, that provides additional storage. At the back of the kitchen is a small room that could easily be converted into a large pantry for even more storage.

Off of the dining area, you will find beautiful barn doors that open into an immersive home-theater space. Originally a formal dining room, this space could be left as a theater or easily converted back into a dining room. The wood wall panels cover the windows and can be removed with ease as well as the carpeting which was cut to fit the room but can be rolled up. **Home Theater Equipment/Electronics/Screen/Etc are not included but may be negotiated**

The garage has built-in shelving as well as 2 Tesla/EV compatible charging ports - one inside the garage and one outside by the driveway.

Located close to expressways 874/878 and the Turnpike as well as US-1 offers easy access to all of Miami Dade County!
**Don't Delay, Schedule via Showing Time Today at arinatsepenyuk59gmail.com

titles: Efficiency by Marlin's Stadium
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


Month to month rental: 
Efficiency for one person alone with independent entrance. No kitchen. Microwave, standard size refrigerator, 1 room / 1 bathroom.  AC from main house and your own ceiling fan. Your own parking space (not in the street but in a carport in front of the house). WiFi and cable included. Water and electricity included. Small space at the front for small BBQ, chair or plants -for example . Lots of storage space (2 closets). No pets allowed. If smoking, IT HAS TO BE OUTSIDE. There is one bed in location , we can take it out if you don't needed it. 
Payment is accepted in check, venmo, cash. (if one check bounces- you pay the bank fee and rest of monthly payments are going to be accepted only in venmo or cash)
1 month deposit and 1st month required.

Renta mes a mes: 
Efficiency para personal sola, entrada independiente.No hay cocina. Microwave, refrigerador tamano estandard,  1 cuarto / 1 bano.  AC central y un ventilador de techo. Espacio de parqueo (no en la calle - rampa privada frente a la casa). WiFi, cable, agua y electricdad incluido. Pequeno espacio al frente para BBQ, silla or plantas- por ejemplo. 1 closet grande, y otro mas pequeno. No se permiten mascotas. Si fuma , TIENE QUE SER AFUERA. Tiene una cama que se quita si no la necesita. 
Pagos mensuales de renta se aceptan en  cheque, venmo or cash. (si un cheque es retornado- usted paga por el fee del banco y el resto de lo los pagos mensuales se aceptaran solo por venmo o cash). 
Se requiere 1 mes de deposito y el primer mes

To schedule a tour
We now book our tour appointments online! Please call or text us at
  show contact info
 to self-schedule from your phone! Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Property Description
Discover your new apartment home in Miami, Florida. With a location on NW 7th St. in Miami's 33172 zip code, residents can easily connect with a number of points of interest within a few miles. At 7 West Apartments, you'll have access to a variety of amenities and features including newly upgraded kitchens,  tile floors, private balconies, and yards and a swimming pool.*Pricing, availability and lease terms are subject to change without notice. Equal Housing Opportunity.2x2 Almond Cabinets, Previous Owners Granite SS Appliances
Details
Availability date: September 4, 2021
Pets: Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)
Pet notes: Adult pets over one (1) year of age are accepted on the following criteria:
1. A dog or cat is considered a pet. Animals such as ferrets, snakes and other reptiles,
rabbits and some birds are not allowed on the community’s premises.
2. A veterinarian certificate must be provided verifying the pet’s age, weight and current
vaccinations.
3. A maximum of two (2) pets per apartment are allowed with a non-refundable fee for each
pet.
4. A one time $500.00 non-refundable pet fee and an additional $350.00 non-refundable
pet fee for the second pet is due prior to move-in,.
5. A dog under the age of 12 months will be accepted with a $1000.00 one-time pet fee due
prior to move- in.
6. A photograph must be provided for each pet. Pets must be interviewed by the
management for temperament.
7. Assistive animals are not considered pets and are not subject to the above criteria.
8. Pet waste removal charge of $50.00 per occurrence if found not disposing of pet waste
properly.
9. The following dog breeds are not allowed: Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, American Bull
Terrier aka Pit Bull, Chow, Doberman Pinscher, German Shepherd, Great Dane, Presa
Canario, Rottweiler, Staffshire Terrier, Siberian Huskies, Wolf hybrid and mixed breeds
that include one of the above restricted breeds.

titles: Find flexibility for $667 weekly at WoodSpring Suites
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


Looking for a place to call home for a couple months or longer? At Woodspring Suites Doral we have everything you need without the hassles of traditional apartments, all at a great rate. Each room comes with a fully equipped kitchen and plenty of workspace. And unlike apartments, cable and Wi-Fi are already hooked up and free! With no lease and no credit check, we are move-in ready. So just bring yourself – and your furry family member – and feel right at home.


Property Amenities

•  All Rooms Non-Smoking 
•  Pet-Friendly Rooms Available
•  Bi-Weekly Housekeeping Included
•  On-Site Guest Laundry
•  Free Off-Street Parking

In-Room Amenities

•  Fully Equipped Kitchens
•  Full-Size Refrigerator
•  Electric Range
•  Microwave
•  Free Wi-Fi
•  Flat Screen TVs
•  Free Cable with Premium Channels

Staying less than 4 weeks? We also have great nightly, weekly, and 28+ night rates. 
Call for details.

Minimum 28 night length of stay required. Rates and availability subject to change. Rate will vary by room type and stay dates. Rate not inclusive of taxes and fees.

Pet Policy: A $50 + tax fee per pet (dogs only) fee plus $10 per night payable the first night of your stay. Weight, size, and breed restrictions may apply.

titles: Apartments for rent from $1000 monthly. Call or text us now!
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


Apartments for rent from $1000 to $3500 monthly available in Miami Dade and Broward County. Call or text us now or visit our website to check all inventory on https://data.kw.com/
PLEASE READ REQUIREMENTS BELLOW:
- one year lease contract with renewal option 
- proof of income or funds will be required before signing the lease 
- household income must be 2.5 times of the rent
- background check (tenant paid separately and may take from 5 to 14 business days to get results) 
- first month rent, last month rent and security deposit(monthly rent amount) will be required before possession 
- pet deposit if applicable 
Tenants with low credit score might be asked to put one more additional deposit, depends on the buildings association or landlord requirements. 
Please note we are Real Estate company and not the owners. The process will take time to get paperwork ready for Landlords. The whole lease process may take up to 4 weeks so plan you move in advance. Our service is free!

titles: Great location - Heart of South Beach. Barbizon Ocean Drive Apartment
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


Beautiful Studio apartment on Ocean Drive. Great location - Heart of South Beach. Comfortably fits 4-5 people Free WIFI
## Space Located on Ocean’s Drive, this cheerful and bright studio apartment in the heart of Miami is the perfect base for a hot holiday or smart business trip. The ocean is only a stone’s throw away, ready for you to dive into. Beautifully decorated, this apartment offers you the comfort of a home away from home. The kitchen is equipped with a microwave, hot plate, and a big fridge. Store snacks and cook healthy meals to your heart’s content! The apartment can house up to four-five people comfortably. The studio has 2 queen size beds and a couch sofa that converts to twin bed. The apartment is fully furnished. Fresh linen and clean towels are readily available. The apartment is kept spotless clean and tidy for guests.

Visit the shops of Ocean Drive, have a late-night drink at a bar, enjoy thrilling watersports, go for a swim in the ocean and eat delicious meals at the local restaurants: All located nearby on the same street! After a wild night out, you can relax in front of the TV and surf the internet with free Wi-Fi to your heart’s content. A perfect Miami Beach experience awaits here for you!

During the daytime you can go Nikki Beach Club, and at night time you can walk to all the great bars/restaurants/clubs that South Beach has to offer. Parking is right across the street with reasonable pricing. Best Parking App/website can be used for street/garage parking options/reservations.

descriptions:

Magazine Perfect Top Designer House!!! A dream come true home. White clean line curb appeal w/ luxe details curated throughout. Wide open floor plan exudes light and sophistication. 4 Bedrooms all with en-suite baths with rain showers offer privacy with a split plan. Top of the line finishes, hardware, fixtures, and appliances. About the neighborhood, Morningside, Miami's first historic neighborhood, is a gated community of approximately 500 homes just blocks away from the Biscayne Bay. It is located in a section of Miami known as the Upper Eastside, to the east of Biscayne Boulevard from NE 50 Terr to NE 62nd St. Morningside boasts the largest park in Miami.

The community features outdoor gym, children's playground, soccer field and basketball court. This unique and tasteful home is the only of its kind and situated in a prime location directly across the golf course. Private backyard haven with pristine landscaping. Custom built designer fountain, professional BBQ island with additional burner & refrigerator installed, perfect for entertaining. White and light grey marble floors throughout and warm Brazilian hardwood floors in 2 of the bedrooms. The master bedroom has an on suite bathroom and a large walk-in closet.

descriptions:

Sought after Juniper model in Paloma. 3 bedroom plus den, 3 full bathrooms. New high end luxury flooring being installed in the den and upstairs. NO CARPET! Hurricane impact windows and doors, plantation shutters in all the rooms, granite counters in kitchen with subway tile backsplash and stainless steel appliances. Paloma is a gated community centrally located to I95, Florida Turnpike, Gardens Mall, Downtown at the Gardens, Alton Town Center and beautiful Jupiter and Juno Beaches. Small pet may be considered at owners discretion and with a non refundable pet fee. Text me to see this home. Owners require a good credit score over 650. You need proof of income three times the rent with your last two pay stubs. My name is Craig Ries with Paradise Real Estate International. Contact me if you want a current MLS list of other rentals in your price range. My service is from WPB north to Jupiter. My service is free to help you find a rental, the landlords pay my commission.

  show contact info

Property Description
Discover your new apartment home in Miami, Florida. With a location on NW 7th St. in Miami's 33172 zip code, residents can easily connect with a number of points of interest within a few miles. At 7 West Apartments, you'll have access to a variety of amenities and features including newly upgraded kitchens,  tile floors, private balconies, and yards and a swimming pool.*Pricing, availability and lease terms are subject to change without notice. Equal Housing Opportunity.2x2
Details
Availability date: Today
Pets: Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)
Pet notes: Adult pets over one (1) year of age are accepted on the following criteria:
1. A dog or cat is considered a pet. Animals such as ferrets, snakes and other reptiles,
rabbits and some birds are not allowed on the community’s premises.
2. A veterinarian certificate must be provided verifying the pet’s age, weight and current
vaccinations.
3. A maximum of two (2) pets per apartment are allowed with a non-refundable fee for each
pet.
4. A one time $500.00 non-refundable pet fee and an additional $350.00 non-refundable
pet fee for the second pet is due prior to move-in,.
5. A dog under the age of 12 months will be accepted with a $1000.00 one-time pet fee due
prior to move- in.
6. A photograph must be provided for each pet. Pets must be interviewed by the
management for temperament.
7. Assistive animals are not considered pets and are not subject to the above criteria.
8. Pet waste removal charge of $50.00 per occurrence if found not disposing of pet waste
properly.
9. The following dog breeds are not allowed: Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, American Bull
Terrier aka Pit Bull, Chow, Doberman Pinscher, German Shepherd, Great Dane, Presa
Canario, Rottweiler, Staffshire Terrier, Siberian Huskies, Wolf hybrid and mixed breeds
that include one of the above restricted breeds.

30’ seafarer sailboat with four single bunks and optional blow up bed between two bunks to create a giant 10’ bed. Full kitchen, stove top, microwave, fridge, freezer, sink, toaster/conventional oven. ‘Walk in closet’ in v berth with eight shelve cubbies and lots of storage. Boat can be kept where it is or move to a different marina but there will be a cost difference depending on slip price. 1 month rent and 1000 security deposit due before move in. Option to rent monthly or long term. House trained pets allowed but there will be an extra security deposit.

To schedule a tour
We now book our tour appointments online! Please call or text us at
  show contact info
 to self-schedule from your phone! Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Property Description
Discover your new apartment home in Miami, Florida. With a location on NW 7th St. in Miami's 33172 zip code, residents can easily connect with a number of points of interest within a few miles. At 7 West Apartments, you'll have access to a variety of amenities and features including newly upgraded kitchens,  tile floors, private balconies, and yards and a swimming pool.*Pricing, availability and lease terms are subject to change without notice. Equal Housing Opportunity.2x2 Almond Cabinets, Previous Owners Granite SS Appliances
Details
Availability date: September 4, 2021
Pets: Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)
Pet notes: Adult pets over one (1) year of age are accepted on the following criteria:
1. A dog or cat is considered a pet. Animals such as ferrets, snakes and other reptiles,
rabbits and some birds are not allowed on the community’s premises.
2. A veterinarian certificate must be provided verifying the pet’s age, weight and current
vaccinations.
3. A maximum of two (2) pets per apartment are allowed with a non-refundable fee for each
pet.
4. A one time $500.00 non-refundable pet fee and an additional $350.00 non-refundable
pet fee for the second pet is due prior to move-in,.
5. A dog under the age of 12 months will be accepted with a $1000.00 one-time pet fee due
prior to move- in.
6. A photograph must be provided for each pet. Pets must be interviewed by the
management for temperament.
7. Assistive animals are not considered pets and are not subject to the above criteria.
8. Pet waste removal charge of $50.00 per occurrence if found not disposing of pet waste
properly.
9. The following dog breeds are not allowed: Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, American Bull
Terrier aka Pit Bull, Chow, Doberman Pinscher, German Shepherd, Great Dane, Presa
Canario, Rottweiler, Staffshire Terrier, Siberian Huskies, Wolf hybrid and mixed breeds
that include one of the above restricted breeds.

Apartments that honor the citys past and celebrate its contemporary allure. Welcome To Doral View

This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 940 Sq. Ft. 

Virtual, scheduled in person and walk in tours are available. Call us today for more information and to make an appointment!

Nestled on lush, idyllic grounds, our modern community offers one, two, and three bedroom luxury apartments for rent in Fontainebleau, Miami, Florida.

Your new apartment is a sophisticated oasis in an elegant community. Inspired by Spanish architecture, it features a crisp stucco exterior offset with red tile roofs. Each home is designed with high ceilings, a bright expansive floor plan, and a chef-style kitchen with energy-efficient stainless-steel appliances.

In the evenings, retreat to the spectacular swimming pool for a sunset swim or relax poolside with a cool drink. Expect more from every moment at Doral View Apartments 

Features
- Granite Countertops 
- Individual Air Conditioning 
- Energy-Efficient Stainless-Steel Appliances 
- Dishwasher 
- Garages Available 
- Spacious Walk-In Closets 
- Contemporary Custom Cabinetry 
- Private Balcony or Patio 
- Full-Size Washer & Dryer Included 
- Design-Inspired Floor Plans with High Ceilings 
- Sophisticated Porcelain Tile Flooring 

Community Amenities
- Professional Business Center 
- Walking/Jogging Path 
- Landscaping & Community Grounds 
- Furnished Apartments Available 
- Community Tennis Courts 
- Gated Electronic Entrance 
- Private Cabanas 
- State-of-the-Art Fitness Center 
- Outdoor Kitchens 
- Resort-Style Swimming Pools & Sundeck 


Office Hours

Sunday:12:00PM-5:00PM


Pet Policy
Cats & Dogs welcome. Max of 2 pets. Breed restrictions apply. Max combined weight 100lbs. 

Income Requirements:
3 times rent amount required. 

Equal Housing Opportunity

Property Description
Seize your chance to live in one of our upgraded apartments in this premier gated community in South Miami. Come home every day to the embrace of meticulous landscaping, modern apartments, and thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life. Ludlam Point offers one and two-bedroom townhome apartments and flats with all the upgrades such as stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, glass-tile backsplash, washer and dryers, wood-style plank flooring and a monitored alarm system.Gather with friends at the pool cabana area with bar, outdoor entertainment center, BBQ area, and wireless internet. Or, stay in shape at state-of-the-art fitness center or basketball court. We also offer a car-care center and extra storage — integrating a small town connection with big city convenience.Living at Ludlam Point Apartments means you are close to everything — UM, South Miami, upscale Coral Gables, Coconut Grove and Bacardi are just minutes away. Our gated community features seven buildings infused with local flair and alive with the spirit of Miami. Come and see for yourself why Ludlam Point is the place to live!The Beacon - Renovated

Looking for a place to call home for a couple months or longer? At Woodspring Suites Doral we have everything you need without the hassles of traditional apartments, all at a great rate. Each room comes with a fully equipped kitchen and plenty of workspace. And unlike apartments, cable and Wi-Fi are already hooked up and free! With no lease and no credit check, we are move-in ready. •  Electric Range
•  Microwave

titles: $14,000-3/3.5-Jade Signature at Sunny Isles Beach-Luxe Beach Living
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


Three Bedroom units starting at $14,000/mo with almost 3000 SF. Amenities Include: 
Health and wellness center with sauna and steam room. Coed hammam/Turkish bath. Invigorating cold rain shower. Relaxing water terrace with massage cabanas and Jacuzzis overlooking the ocean. Full menu of spa services. Manicure/Pedicure lounge. Massage and facial treatment room. Cold-press juice bar. Outdoor sunset yoga deck surrounded by zen garden. Relaxation zone. Beachfront state-of-the-art fitness center featuring free weights and cardio equipment with fully appointed training areas. Exercise and spin studio. Private Pilates studio. Women’s and men’s locker rooms. 6 Signature Guest Suites ranging from 561 to 628 sq. ft., especially designed to offer privacy and extra space for family and friends during their extended vacations. Beachfront resort deck featuring an organic free-form swimming pool with zero entry, secluded cabanas and hot tub surrounded by nature. Beach bar and grill offering pool and beach service, as well as to residences. Private beach amenities including chaise lounges, umbrellas and a children’s sandbox at the shoreline. Teens’ tech lounge. Children’s playroom with video games and smart board. Toddler sensory and reading center. 25-meter lap pool on south side of tower offering maximum sun exposure. Entertainment lounge and terrace facing lap pool with billiards, poker table and backgammon. Wine bar. Residents’ kitchen, adjacent to the main pool and entertainment lounge, perfect for self-service snacks and refreshments or hosting casual parties at the beach level. Landscaped journey along beachfront path to the beach. Worldwide concierge service. Exclusive clubroom with extensive outdoor terrace and demonstration kitchen, perfect for private events. Beach Pavilion Terrace. Breakfast area with indoor /outdoor seating on beach pavilion terrace. Business center with conference room and private office. Private elevator lobbies. Reading lounge. Library. High-speed Internet and wi-fi. High speed elevators with state-of-the-art LCD touch screens. Shabbat elevator. 24-hour security. Underground parking garage with security surveillance. Doorman and valet, at your service. Car-wash area. Electric-car charging service.

descriptions:

For Rent:
951 Brickell Ave APT 4110,
Miami, FL 33131
2 beds 2.5 baths 1,289 sqft
$3500 a month

.
Yes it's time to move into the Plaza on Brickell!
You can enjoy the living on the lap of luxury!
Plaza on Brickell condos are just minutes from the thriving Mary Brickell Village retail shops and restaurants, residents can walk and enjoy the new urban lifestyle, day or night. There are dozens of hotspots close by in a new Sushi Siam coming soon... right in the building.
Plaza on Brickell is located in the heart of Brickell Avenue and is two towers. The North tower 851 Brickell is 56 stories and the South Tower is 43 stories. The east views are spectacular because the neighboring buildings are just 20 stories high. 
.
• Two-story lobby with sleek, contemporary design in common areas
• State-of-the-art fitness center and spa with the latest strength and cardiovascular equipment
• Multi-purpose club room with billiards
• Wine storage room
• Full service business center with high-speed data and voice capability
• Available "personal touch" services include concierge, valet, on-site dry cleaning pick-up and delivery, car washing, dog care/walking and housekeeping
• Assigned covered parking in garage
• Valet parking
• Controlled, gated entry and 24-hour attended lobby for your peace of mind
• Heated pool and poolside lounge chairs
• Steam room and sauna
• One and two bedroom luxury urban condos with 9' ceilings
• Finished completely to move-in condition including carpeting and tile
• Advanced technology Smart Building, pre-wired for multiple-jack high speed Internet, data, voice and cable TV access
• Tinted, energy-efficient and impact-resistant sliding glass doors and windows
• Energy-efficient air conditioning and heating system
• Technologically advanced fire safety system
• Full carpeting throughout living, dining and bedrooms

titles: Grove Princess Apartments
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


Grove Princess Apartments
2901 Virginia Street

About Grove Princess Apartments
Experience your new apartment at Grove Princess Apartments in Miami. The location in Miami's 33133 area is an ideal place to move. Make a visit to see the current floorplan options. The leasing staff is waiting to show you all that this community has in store. Stop by to talk about leasing your new apartment.



Coconut Grove, Florida 33133
Please reply with a telephone number.

Small and Large Studios from $670-790 
1 bedroom only $985
2 bedroom/2 bath $1440

Located roughly two miles south of downtown Miami, Coconut Grove sits right next to U.S. Route 1, making it easy for residents to commute into the city. Several open spaces, including Peacock Park and David T. Kennedy Park, provide places to run, gather, or simply gaze out at the sparkling water. The shoreline is dotted with marinas and yacht clubs, and white-sand beaches allow for swimming, beachcombing, surfing, and fishing. For those with pets, the Coconut Grove Dog Park provides a terrific space for them to run. Grapeland Water Park hosts an annual Dog-a-Pool-Ooza, where dogs can visit the park on the last day of the season and swim.

Head down to the intersection of Grand Avenue and South Bayshore Drive for a variety of cuisine choices. Locals particularly enjoy Lulu restaurant in Commodore Plaza, where experienced chefs prepare delectable meals using organic vegetables, local free-range eggs, and other authentic ingredients.
Students welcomed.

Laundry on Premises
Private Parking
Security entrance
Air Conditioning

*Prices and Availability Subject to Change without notice.
EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY
Fair Housing Act
The federal Fair Housing Act prohibits discrimination in all stages of the home buying process on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, familial status, or disability. In particular, housing advertising that indicates a discriminatory preference based on one of these factors is illegal. The U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development ("HUD") has published guidelines for those who advertise homes for sale. You can report housing discrimination to HUD in a number of ways, including via phone at  show contact info
 or via web form. HUD provides a number of resources for consumers and professionals relating to fair housing. This is a good place to start: http://www.hud.gov/off ... ghts.cfm.

**Features include 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, updated kitchen**
1/1 apartment **** Price Cut****
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


YOUR HOME IS WAITING. Doral West Apartments is a premier living destination that offers 1, 2 and 3 bedroom garden or townhome-style apartments in Doral, Florida. Located within minutes of the area's most progressive employers and just sixteen miles west of downtown Miami- Doral West is convenient to shopping, dining and popular entertainment. Plus, we are nestled in the A-rated Doral school district and we are located less than a mile from the Florida Turnpike and less than 11 miles from Miami International Airport.Bask in the Florida sun at one of our two resort-style swimming pools and spa, or enjoy a stroll along our 13-acre lake. Stay active in our new fitness center or on the private tennis court. Just relax or get some work done in our all new resident lounge with cyber café. Plus, our pet park will give your furry friend ample green space to play. At Doral West Apartments, you can choose from spacious garden or townhome-style apartments that offer the ideal setting to entertain friends and family. With indulgent details like views of our 13-acre lake, spacious master suites and walk-in closets, you'll feel like royalty. Combine style and comfort with large kitchens that feature new stainless steel appliances, full size washer/dryer, faux hardwood flooring and upscale finishes throughout.  Call Now:  show contact info
Need more information? Copy this link:http://fairfield-apts.com/76131p This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 897 Sq. Ft. Features - Garden tub  - Full-size washer and dryer*  - Custom wood cabinetry in both the kitchen and bathrooms*  - Hardwood style flooring*  - Pantry  - Lake views*  - Oversized screened-in patio or balcony*  - Breakfast bar  - Stainless steel appliances*  - Vaulted Ceiling*  - Attached garage parking*  - Walk-in closet  - NEWLY RENOVATED APARTMENTS! Community Amenities - Less than eleven miles west of the Miami International Airport  - Online Payments Available  - Sand beach  - Spa/hot tub  - New chic resident clubhouse with WiFi lounge and java bar  - Close to the Florida Turnpike and SR 836  - Bilingual staff  - Additional air conditioned storage available  - Pets welcome  - Tennis court  - Playground  - Large dog walk area  - 13-acre lake with walking trail  - Social and networking events  - Fitness center with cardio and weight equipment  - Controlled access gate  - Two swimming pools  - Business center  - Poolside WiFi  - Flexible lease terms available  - NEWLY RENOVATED COMMUNITY! Pet Policy We are a pet-friendly community! Visit our website for additional details. titles: Washer and Dryer inside of your unit!!
descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


To schedule a tour
We now book our tour appointments online! Please call or text us at
  show contact info
 to self-schedule from your phone! Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Property Description
Discover your new apartment home in Miami, Florida. With a location on NW 7th St. in Miami's 33172 zip code, residents can easily connect with a number of points of interest within a few miles. At 7 West Apartments, you'll have access to a variety of amenities and features including newly upgraded kitchens,  tile floors, private balconies, and yards and a swimming pool.*Pricing, availability and lease terms are subject to change without notice. Equal Housing Opportunity.
Details
Availability date: August 24, 2021
Pets: Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)
Pet notes: Adult pets over one (1) year of age are accepted on the following criteria:
1. A dog or cat is considered a pet. Animals such as ferrets, snakes and other reptiles,
rabbits and some birds are not allowed on the community’s premises.
2. A veterinarian certificate must be provided verifying the pet’s age, weight and current
vaccinations.
3. A maximum of two (2) pets per apartment are allowed with a non-refundable fee for each
pet.
4. A one time $500.00 non-refundable pet fee and an additional $350.00 non-refundable
pet fee for the second pet is due prior to move-in,.
5. A dog under the age of 12 months will be accepted with a $1000.00 one-time pet fee due
prior to move- in.
6. A photograph must be provided for each pet. Pets must be interviewed by the
management for temperament.
7. Assistive animals are not considered pets and are not subject to the above criteria.
8. Pet waste removal charge of $50.00 per occurrence if found not disposing of pet waste
properly.
9. The following dog breeds are not allowed: Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, American Bull
Terrier aka Pit Bull, Chow, Doberman Pinscher, German Shepherd, Great Dane, Presa
Canario, Rottweiler, Staffshire Terrier, Siberian Huskies, Wolf hybrid and mixed breeds
that include one of the above restricted breeds.

descriptions:
QR Code Link to This Post


To schedule a tour
We now book our tour appointments online! Please call or text us at
  show contact info
 to self-schedule from your phone! Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Property Description
Discover your new apartment home in Miami, Florida. With a location on NW 7th St. in Miami's 33172 zip code, residents can easily connect with a number of points of interest within a few miles. At 7 West Apartments, you'll have access to a variety of amenities and features including newly upgraded kitchens,  tile floors, private balconies, and yards and a swimming pool.*Pricing, availability and lease terms are subject to change without notice. Equal Housing Opportunity.
Details
Availability date: July 31, 2021
Pets: Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)
Pet notes: Adult pets over one (1) year of age are accepted on the following criteria:
1. A dog or cat is considered a pet. Animals such as ferrets, snakes and other reptiles,
rabbits and some birds are not allowed on the community’s premises.
2. A veterinarian certificate must be provided verifying the pet’s age, weight and current
vaccinations.
3. A maximum of two (2) pets per apartment are allowed with a non-refundable fee for each
pet.
4. A one time $500.00 non-refundable pet fee and an additional $350.00 non-refundable
pet fee for the second pet is due prior to move-in,.
5. A dog under the age of 12 months will be accepted with a $1000.00 one-time pet fee due
prior to move- in.
6. A photograph must be provided for each pet. Pets must be interviewed by the
management for temperament.
7. Assistive animals are not considered pets and are not subject to the above criteria.
8. Pet waste removal charge of $50.00 per occurrence if found not disposing of pet waste
properly.
9. The following dog breeds are not allowed: Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, American Bull
Terrier aka Pit Bull, Chow, Doberman Pinscher, German Shepherd, Great Dane, Presa
Canario, Rottweiler, Staffshire Terrier, Siberian Huskies, Wolf hybrid and mixed breeds
that include one of the above restricted breeds.
